protein.specific_function: Specifically deaminates adenosine-37 to inosine in tRNA-Ala.

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on carbon-nitrogen (but not peptide) bonds
hydrolase activity, acting on carbon-nitrogen (but not peptide) bonds, in cyclic amidines

reference.reference_text: Maas S, Gerber AP, Rich A: Identification and characterization of a human tRNA-specific adenosine deaminase related to the ADAR family of pre-mRNA editing enzymes. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1999 Aug 3;96(16):8895-900.
